title: trilinos +teko +tpetra build fails: cmake: teko requires tpetra enable GlobalOrdinal
body:
`trilinos +teko +tpetra +stratimikos` build fails using:
 * `spack@develop` (7b6ca5903861f7b7e648d651f5715ba6262e2a58 from `Sat Jun 19 08:25:21 2021 -0500`):

Concrete spec: [trilinos.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6689160/trilinos.spec.yaml.txt)
Build log: [trilinos-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6689159/trilinos-build-out.txt)

```
$> spack install -f ./trilinos.spec.yaml
...

==> Warning: Fetching from mirror without a checksum!
  This package is normally checked out from a version control system, but it has been archived on a spack mirror.  This means we cannot know a checksum for the tarball in advance. Be sure that your connection to this mirror is secure!
==> No patches needed for trilinos
```

It seems like the resolution is pretty straightforward. Recording here to keep track as it is resolved.

FYI @sethrj @keitat
